attributes.review: Once I opened the app my phone immediately started glitching 😰😞😪it stole all of my information and now bunker boy has my address. As of now he came to my 😱house and killed my pet caterpillar bc I had walked it 😢😭 on the day of his rally and couldn’t show up 😓😨 He used his 2cm Cheeto fumes to knock me out and I am now being held hostage 🤪🤩🥳
attributes.title: Disappointed 🧚‍♀️❤️✨🧚‍♀️🥰

attributes.review: The Big Cheeto scared me and my dog as soon as we downloaded the app. My poor dog had to had under the couch😔. The content on this app is highly inappropriate. Other than that incident the app is incredibly glitchy and does not work well on cellular data. With all of that being said, I had to conclude that this app gets a one star review. ✌️👋
attributes.title: Eww GROSS

attributes.review: Horrible it told me to turn on notifications and blasting me with notifications disturbing me, I see a notification saying they want my address 👀 harassing me saying they’ll find me and I was in the middle of a funeral when a white van drove 🚘 really fast and hits my aunts casket and causing her to fly out and hitting her head on her tombstone.
attributes.title: Helpp they harassing me 👄👅👅🗡🗡🗡

attributes.review: this app called my mom ugly and spit on my dog 😔 as soon as i opened it a disturbing picture of a s*raight w*ite m*le ( aka d*nald t*ump ) jump scared me and caused me to have a heart attack , anxiety attack , and asthma attack at the same time ! d*nald personally came to visit me in the hospital and called me the n word and unplugged my life support ,, i am currently writing this review from the after life ,, this app is stinky 🤢
attributes.title: dis GUS tAng

attributes.review: The app is just terrible I opened it around my family and they had blood running down there nose and were telling me to get out I ran to get away but outside was the old Cheeto we call “president” he asked are you lost babygorl and I ran for my life I am now in shock and can no longer eat Cheetos because of him 😞😞
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: Right when you load up the app there is an awful photo of a disgusting man! I would have totally died right then and there if Nicki hadn’t taught me to always keep my eyes peeled. Couldn’t even continue to use the app after that traumatic experience, wish I could give it a zero. periodt
attributes.title: keep an eye out for selener 👁👄 ➖

attributes.review:
Don’t download!!! This app will take your whole house! When you open it, you will die on SIGHT. But thank god I had on my hazmat suit!!! I showed my dog and he DIED!! Now we need money for a funeral!! I can't believe that it took my house, money, and phones!!! (I’m writing this on my
25.1 cu. ft. Family Hub French Door Smart Refrigerator in Stainless Steel!) This is what happens!!!!
attributes.title: No...just no..

attributes.review: this app is the worst! do NOT download! it took three days to download and then when i got it, it started sending continuous amounts of emails that weren’t even related to trump. nothing works on there and you can’t do anything! it lags and skips and is honestly aggravating! do not recommend downloading😒
attributes.title: frickin terrible

attributes.review: As I opened the app I was greeted with a terrifying picture of a cheeto puff. Ever since then I’ve been traumatized and have had horrific nightmares. This app is supposed to be encouraging but it has a had a major impact on my mental health and it has all been negative. Everytime I even see a glimpse of the cheeto I have an anxiety attack. Save yourself the mental distress and DO NOT GET THIS APP😔
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!

attributes.review: DO NOT I repeat DO NOT download this app. Not long after downloading it I could see that all my personal information from my credit/debit card, my home address, phone number and more were hacked into. This app is a danger to anyone who downloads it. I don’t know what to do from here but all I can say is please be safe.
attributes.title: MY PERSONAL INFORMATION WAS HACKED
